2. Configuration¶

variable Meaning
DIM Number of dimensions in the vector space.
DATA_TYPE Represents the data type of the point. Assumes values like int or float.
POINT_TYPE Represents the type of point you wish to use from the original Stann library
configure(dim, data_type, point_type=POINT_TYPE_DPOINT)¶

DIM represents the number of dimensions of the vector space you are working in. DATA_TYPE represents the data type of the points, for example int or float. POINT_TYPE is the type of point you choose to use from the original Stann library; this value defaults to dpoint. Example usage:

import stann

stann.configure(5, stann.DATA_TYPE_INT)
int_5d = stann.newRandomPoint(0,100)

stann.configure(2, stann.DATA_TYPE_FLOAT)
float_2d = stann.newRandomPoint(0.0, 100.0)

print(int_5d.coords_tuple())        # (14, 95, 19, 51, 65)
print(float_2d.coords())            # (24.48573, 83.42035)
